Description: Comb; wooden; rectangular; open-work decoration including, in the upper part, a representation of St Menas (?), his hands raised in prayer, between two kneeling camels; in the lower part, a mammal; some punched ring-and-dot decoration.
Curator's comments: Being studied by Hesham Abdel-Qader in view of publication.
Condition: Part of the comb missing and a number of breaks repaired.
